blogPost.excerpt: Prefix helps your business get started with RPA without expensive implementation partners. Automate repetitive work on web and desktop apps that don't have API’s or clean software integrations, and save your team valuable time.
blogPost.body: Prefix helps your business get started with RPA without expensive implementation partners. Automate repetitive work on web and desktop apps that don't have API’s or clean software integrations, and save your team valuable time.
blogPost.title: Prefix - Build custom computer automations anywhere
blogPost.author: Kat Manalac

localize.description: Prefix帮助您的企业开始使用RPA，而无需昂贵的实施伙伴。在没有API或干净的软件集成的Web和桌面应用程序上自动完成重复性工作，并为您的团队节省宝贵的时间。
localize.tagline: 在任何地方建立自定义的计算机自动化系统

localize.description: Prefix幫助您的企業開始使用RPA，而無需昂貴的實施夥伴。在沒有API或乾淨的軟件集成的Web和桌面應用程序上自動完成重複性工作，併爲您的團隊節省寶貴的時間。
localize.tagline: 在任何地方建立自定義的計算機自動化系統
